channel.title: Hello World
channel.description: To express, to empower, to be empowered

item.title: Fury Road!
item.description:
Do you believe there is a green land? Even when there has been one, does that mean it still exists and we should keep looking for it? Sometime the answer is not beyond the horizon, it is there but we are not able to see it. We are blinded because what we used to believe occupied our heart and something we believe that is never going to change.
'
